text: The women's 4x400 metres relay event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 21 and 22 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Kim Wall Jenny Meadows Helen Thieme Lisa Miller ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sheryl Morgan Kareen Gayle Anneisha McLaughlin Melaine Walker ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Adela Marchis Liliana Barbulescu Maria Rus Alina Rîpanu ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
